name: Act or Ignore
description:
"To know what is right and to choose to ignore it is the act of a coward"

You are visiting your home after a long time and have important things to do, like recollecting memories so that you find the answers of why all of that happened to you. 

Game challenges the players with choices and dilemmas alongside a story which could make the player question her choices.

This game is an outcome of the IGDC BYOG game jam, whereby the game challenges the theme by a counter intuitive meaning of it!

Hope you enjoy it! Feedback is welcomed.
